Name: Spliced
About the game: Spliced is a hybrid roguelite deck-builder. Play as a symbiotic ooze, taking the parts and abilities of enemies you defeat, in the form of cards and add them to your deck. Use an exploration deck to manipulate and explore the biome environment and a combat deck to fight enemies. Features Stability Bonuses : Collect enough cards with a common type to achieve powerful synergistic bonuses. Card based interactions : The game is largely interacted with through cards, how you fight enemies, travel through biomes, make choices in events, everything is done through playing cards to make decisions. Deck-building : You will have both a combat and exploration deck that you draft cards for over the course of a run. You will need to be selective in which cards you pick to form the best synergies and meet the requirements for stability bonuses.
